title: Stay Golden Cream Bronzer (001, Light)
features: [MOIRA BEAUTY] Straight forward products that eliminate the fuss. You are reaching for confidence and self-discovery to shape your destiny.
[SUSTAINABILITY] Our products are socially responfible. Cruelty-Free, Vegan, Paraben-Free, Sulfates Free, Phthalate Free, Gluten-Free.
[ALL GENERATIONS] Whether you are a make-up novice or a make-up artist, a lady or a student, Moira products will work for you.

[HOW TO USE IT] Tap a brush in bronzer and sweep it along the areas where the sun naturally kisses, like your temples and forehead. Blend out to diffuse any harsh line for a seamless finish. Tip Use the left-over product on your brush to add warmth to your nose, chin, and neck. NET WEIGHT:0.70 oz. / 20 g INGREDIENTS Phenyl Trimethicone, Silica, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Isononyl Isononano
[WARRANTY PROMISE] If you are not 100% satisfied, we are happy to give you a refund or exchange, no hassles. Add to Cart now!
description: . . . . . . . . MOIRA Stay Golden Cream Bronzer is a lightweight cream formula perfect for achieving a face and body sun-kissed look. This non-sticky and long-lasting formula will easily blend while delivering a soft-focus matte finish look. Infused with natural ingredients such as Coconut, Mango, and Rosehip oil that will keep your skin soft and hydrated for a fresh and healthy glow.. . . . . . . . - Cruelty-Free. - Vegan. - Paraben-Free. - Sulfates Free. - Phthalate Free. . - Gluten-Free. . How to use . HOW TO USE:. Tap a brush in bronzer and sweep it along the areas where the sun naturally kisses, like your temples and forehead. Blend out to diffuse any harsh line for a seamless finish. Tip Use the left-over product on your brush to add warmth to your nose, chin, and neck.. NET WEIGHT:0.70 oz. / 20 g. . . Ingredient List . INGREDIENTS. . Phenyl Trimethicone, Silica, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Isononyl Isononanoate, Mica, Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Wax, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sorbitan Olivate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Cera Microcristallina, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Phenoxyethanol, Lecithin, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Aluminum Hydroxide, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isopropyl Myristate, Isostearic Acid, Tocopherol, MAY CONTAIN / PEUT CONTENIR / PUEDE CONTENER (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxide Yellow (CI 77492), Iron Oxide Red (CI 77491), Iron Oxide Black (CI 77499)..
